name: @waylay/xivelyGetLatestValue
description:
Xively sensor. You need xively API key to run it.
Input parameters are:
  • feed
  • id, that is parameter on which you want to do the threshold crossing
  • threshold

Example: for air quality in Gent
  • feed: 2005839140
  • id: PM2_5
Raw data output is return object
